member.summary: Checks that the structure of the IDS conforms to the schema

member.name: F:IdsLib.Action.XsdCorrectness
member.summary: Checks that any schema provided is valid

member.name: F:IdsLib.Action.IdsContent

member.name: F:IdsLib.Action.IdsContentWithOmissions

member.name: T:IdsLib.Audit
member.summary:
Main static class for invoking the audit functions.
If you wish to audit a single file, the best entry point is . This method allows you to run audits on the provided stream.
For more complex auditing scenarios (e.g. those used by the tool), some automation can be achieved with .
Both APIs provide a return value that can be interpreted to determine if errors have been found.
For more detailed feedback on the specific location of issues encountered, you must pass an interface, and collect events.

member.name: T:IdsLib.Audit.Status
member.summary: Summary return status of the audit functions

member.name: F:IdsLib.Audit.Status.Ok
member.summary: No errors encountered

member.name: F:IdsLib.Audit.Status.NotImplementedError
member.summary: The tool did not complete all the audits, because some aspect of the process are not implemented yet

member.name: F:IdsLib.Audit.Status.InvalidOptionsError
member.summary: The options provided in input are incomplete or inconsistent.

member.name: F:IdsLib.Audit.Status.NotFoundError
member.summary: A resources passed via file name was not found.

member.name: F:IdsLib.Audit.Status.IdsStructureError
member.summary: When auditing an IDS, one or more errors were encountered in the XML structure (includes XSD compliance errors). Depending on the property, this might include XSD schema warnings.

member.name: F:IdsLib.Audit.Status.IdsContentError
member.summary: When auditing an IDS, one or more errors encountered auditing against the implementation agreement.

member.name: F:IdsLib.Audit.Status.XsdSchemaError
member.summary: A custom XSD was passed, but it could not be used because of an error in its content or structure.

member.name: F:IdsLib.Audit.Status.UnhandledError
member.summary: An unmanaged error occurred in the main audit methods. Please contact the authors to address the problem.

member.name: F:IdsLib.Audit.Status.IdsStructureWarning
member.summary: When auditing an IDS, one or more warnings were encountered in the XML structure as defined by the XSD schemas. Triggering this status is configurable using the property.

member.name: M:IdsLib.Audit.Run(System.IO.Stream,IdsLib.SingleAuditOptions,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger)
member.summary: Main entry point to access the library features via a stream to read the IDS content.
member.param: the stream providing access to the content of the IDS to be audited
specifies the behaviour of the audit
the optional logger provides fine-grained feedback on all the audits performed and any issues encountered
member.returns: A status enum that summarizes the result for all audits on the single stream

member.name: M:IdsLib.Audit.RunAsync(System.IO.Stream,IdsLib.SingleAuditOptions,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger)
member.summary: Main entry point to access the library features via a stream to read the IDS content.
member.param: the stream providing access to the content of the IDS to be audited
specifies the behaviour of the audit
the optional logger provides fine-grained feedback on all the audits performed and any issues encountered
member.returns: A status enum that summarizes the result for all audits on the single stream

member.name: M:IdsLib.Audit.Run(IdsLib.IBatchAuditOptions,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger)
member.summary: Entry point to access the library features in batch mode either on directories or single files
member.param: configuration options for the execution of audits on a file or folder
the optional logger provides fine-grained feedback on all the audits performed
member.returns: A status enum that summarizes the result for all audits executed

member.name: T:IdsLib.Audit.ISchemaProvider
member.summary: An interface to allow the specification of schemas to be loaded when reading the IDS xml file.

member.name: M:IdsLib.Audit.ISchemaProvider.GetSchemas(System.IO.Stream,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema}@)
member.summary: This method should return the collection of schemas to be loaded.
member.param: If available, this is the version of the schema that the application has determined appropriate for the IDS.
Logger for detailed feedback on any useful information.
The schemas to be loaded for the schema validation
member.returns: The status of the function, if no problem encountered, return .

member.name: T:IdsLib.IBatchAuditOptions
member.summary: This interface contains the parameters to configure a complex execution of the audit in a batch scenario.

member.name: P:IdsLib.IBatchAuditOptions.SchemaFiles
member.summary: XSD schema to load, this is useful when testing changes in the schema (e.g. GitHub repo).

member.name: P:IdsLib.IBatchAuditOptions.AuditSchemaDefinition
member.summary: Check validity of the xsd schema(s) passed with the parameter.

member.name: P:IdsLib.IBatchAuditOptions.InputExtension
member.summary: This is used to define the extension to load when passing a folder in the parameter. In doubt set it to "ids".

member.name: P:IdsLib.IBatchAuditOptions.InputSource
member.summary: Input IDS to be processed; it can be a file or a folder.

member.name: P:IdsLib.IBatchAuditOptions.OmitIdsContentAudit
member.summary: If set to true skips the audit of the semantic aspects of the IDS.

member.name: P:IdsLib.IBatchAuditOptions.OmitIdsContentAuditPattern
member.summary: Regex applied to file name to omit the audit of the semantic aspects of the IDS. This can be useful to omit strict audit of files that are known to have content issues (e.g. failing documentation of the buildingSMART IDS website).

member.summary: Used for facets that have more audits if used as requirements than if used in the applicability

member.name: P:IdsLib.IdsSchema.IdsNodes.IIdsCardinalityFacet.IsRequired
member.summary: This will be true for all applicabiliy facets, but will be false for optional and prohibited Logical type constraints are only applied to the ones that are required, excluiding optional and prohibited.

member.name: M:IdsLib.IdsSchema.IdsNodes.IIfcTypeConstraintProvider.GetTypesFilter(IdsLib.IfcSchema.SchemaInfo)
member.summary:
Collection of the only valid types determined by the facet, used for auditing of compatibility of multiple facets together.
If null it is ignored at auditing time.

member.name: T:IdsLib.IdsSchema.IdsNodes.NodeIdentification
member.summary:
Provides a way to identify the element of the xml with line/poistion or relative index inside the IDS Instances of this class are passed as a parameter in the calls, and by default it presents the location by line and number.
A custom implementation of ILogger allows you to cast the received state parameter to IReadOnlyList<KeyValuePair<string, object>> and receive instances of NodeIdentification as parameters, to access the precise identifier.

member.name: P:IdsLib.IdsSchema.IdsNodes.NodeIdentification.PositionalIdentifier
member.summary: Provides positional identification of a node within and IDS via its hierarchy. Indices are 1-based to be user friendly. The hierarchy is separated by forward slash char.

member.name: P:IdsLib.IdsSchema.IdsNodes.NodeIdentification.NodeType

member.summary: Formats the value of the current instance using the required format.

an optional provider
member.returns: a non null string

member.name: T:IdsLib.LibraryInformation
member.summary:
General information on the assembly without reflection.
This is useful for environments that do not allow to load information from the DLL dynamically (e.g. Blazor).

member.name: P:IdsLib.LibraryInformation.Commit
member.summary: Static field with the short commit hash at compilation time

member.name: P:IdsLib.LibraryInformation.Sha
member.summary: Static field with the full SHA hash at compilation time

member.name: P:IdsLib.LibraryInformation.Isdirty
member.summary: Static field with informing of possible dirty repository on compilation. When compiled remotely it does not necessarily mean that the code differs from the commit.

member.name: P:IdsLib.LibraryInformation.CommitDate
member.summary: Static field with the full datetime string of the commit.

member.name: P:IdsLib.LibraryInformation.AssemblyVersion
member.summary: Static field with hardcoded DLL version number.

member.summary: No information or error is triggered, the warning is ignored. Report a status of and no information log.

member.summary: Report a status of , but issue information to the logger.

member.name: T:IdsLib.SingleAuditOptions
member.summary:
Configuration parameters needed to setup the audit of a single IDS. The property is currently required to avoid the need to seek the stream, then resume the audit once the version is detected from the content.
Future versions will attempt to relax this requirement.
Ensure that the properties of the base class are also populated.

member.name: P:IdsLib.SingleAuditOptions.IdsVersion
member.summary: Defines what version of the schema we are auditing against.
